snippet: In a third straight victory this year, the conservative prime minister’s party won control of all county assemblies and all but one of the largest cities, including the capital.
abstract: Hungarian Prime Min Viktor Orban continues his steady consolidation of power in local and municipal elections with his governing Fidesz party winning control of all county assemblies and all but one of the largest cities.

byline.contributor: Palko Karasz contributed reporting from Paris.

lead_paragraph: In a third straight victory this year, the conservative prime minister’s party won control of all county assemblies and all but one of the largest cities, including the capital.

headline.main: Elections in Hungary Tighten Prime Minister’s Hold on Power
headline.print_headline: Elections in Hungary Tighten Prime Minister’s Hold on Power
